features.title: Targets
features.amazing_design: TNT brings you convenience and confidence
features.description: The TNT team intends to make payment easy by creating a decentralized payment network for all artists in music, cinema, and other art disciplines - while preserving the intellectual property of the work from around the world. In this regard, TNT token holders can use their tokens, albums, singles, concerts, movies, series and purchase a variety of works of art through the TNT payment network. In this process, in addition to quick and easy access to the desired works, support your artist. Holders of TNT tokens can earn a monthly profit by maintaining it monthly. This profit can be from 5 to 15% depending on the volume and monthly changes.

features.title: Income Generation
features.caption: The revenue for TNT token supporters will be from 5 to 25 percent on a monthly basis and with confidence.

features.title: Support The Characters
features.caption: By purchasing the works of your desired artist, you can work with them to receive quality, more desirable and graceful works directly from your artists.

features.title: Globalization
features.caption: One of the important goals of the TNT token is a global approach to supporting artists and artists. As the project progresses, we decide to offer this payment network to the whole world.

features.title: The Future Of Token
features.caption: The number of these tokens is very limited because they collect and pay a significant amount in support processes. Therefore, it is estimated that in the first and second year of its presentation can be several times the original value.

features.title: Payment Integration
features.caption: With a large selection of artists from around the world, the TNT team makes it very easy for you to access services and thereby provide opportunities for your advancement.

items.title: What is TNT?
items.description: The TNT token is the first token in the field of media and music payment. The TNT token is used to facilitate the purchase of works by artists from around the world. Soon the purchase of singles, albums, concerts and all media and art applications will be placed on this payment network.

items.title: About TNT project
items.description: The TNT team intends to make payment easy by creating a decentralized payment network for all artists in music, cinema, and other art disciplines - while preserving the intellectual property of the work from around the world. In this regard, TNT token holders can use their tokens, albums, singles, concerts, movies, series and purchase a variety of works of art through the TNT payment network. In this process, in addition to quick and easy access to the desired works, support your artist. Holders of TNT tokens can earn a monthly profit by maintaining it monthly. This profit can be from 5 to 15% depending on the volume and monthly changes.

items.title: Why Binance Smart Chain?
items.description: The Bainance Smart Chain (BSC) was developed as a tool to use robust smart contracts with much greater speed and efficiency than other competing chains. With decentralized exchanges in the BSC offering fast-paced exchanges and very low commissions, the BSC has begun to become one of China's most widely used blocks for decentralized finance (Defi). The BSC uses a 5-second block speed token protocol developed by the Binance team. BEP-20. Bep-20 / BSC in 5 seconds: https://trustwallet.com/blog/binance-smart-chain-in-numbers The benefits of Binance Smart Chain are: It is a dedicated blockchain that provides security and safety for all users he does. And its native dual-chain interoperability allows developers to cross-chain. Communicate and scale high-performance Dapps that require a fast and smooth user experience. It is EVM compatible and supports all available Atrium tools with faster and cheaper transactions. Its chain governance, with a Proof of Staked Authority consensus, built on 21 creditors that approve transactions, provides decentralization and enables significant community participation. The TNT token is not responsible for actions taken on the Binance smart chain.

items.title: What is the token supply?
items.description: Token supply: One of the main components of Ramzarz tokens is its supply. Now, there are three types of offerings to look at when it comes to cryptocurrencies. There is supply in circulation, total supply and maximum supply. Circulation of a token is the number of chips that have been issued so far and are currently in circulation. The total token supply is the number of tokens that currently exist, except that they may have been burned. Finally, the maximum supply of a token is the maximum number of tokens that can be generated. For some tokens, there is no set maximum supply. If you find that the turnover of a particular token has been regularly increased by project developers over time, you can assume that the token value will increase in the future. On the other hand, if a large number of tokens are released at the same time or repeatedly, the value of the token may decrease.
